column5: In the heart of the Preston/Hillcrest corridor, enjoy a quiet, shaded, secure, and upscale refuge. Close to hike/bike trail, Cooper Center, Medical City, TI, Weston Park Central Hotel Conference Center, Galleria & DART rail with easy I-635 on/off. Private 1st floor suite with ensuite bath & king-sized bed. Share downstairs living/kitchen. Cooked organic breakfast available.
